sentences: Joint Implementation Supervisory Committee (JISC) Chair Benoît Leguet presented the JISC s annual report (FCCC/KP/CMP/2010/9), underlining achievements such as adoption of a standard for considering materiality and rules for accounting for changes in an existing project.
He also identified the need for fundamental changes in Joint Implementation, as well as increased financial support, in order for the mechanism to continue its operation.
The EU supported continuation of Joint Implementation and expressed willingness to discuss further improvements and changes to its operation beyond 2012.
UKRAINE highlighted that more work is needed before a decision can be finalized.
Washington Zhakata (Zimbabwe) and Helmut Hojesky (Austria) will co-chair a contact group.
